descriptionHTML:
Play the world's first complete, 5 reels, multi-line casino slots game on your watch!

Amazing slot machines with all of the Vegas casino features you love - Wilds, Free Spins and Bonus Games!


Enjoy the only full casino slots machine game that runs completely on your Android wear device. Play anytime, anywhere without taking the phone out of your pocket. Enjoyment and excitement are now part of your watch experience!

Whenever you've got a minute, spin some reels and you might hit some lucky big wins! Get your Vegas experience right on your wrist anytime you want.


SlotoWatch includes all the great features that are available on casino slot machine games on your phone, just on your watch:
5 reels, multiple winning lines, free-spins, bonus mini-games and wildcard symbols.


Game Features:
• Free to play
• FREE COINS every 4 hours!
• 5 Reels, multi win lines
• Scatter / Bonus / Wild symbols on every machine - Giving you the same thrill as of Vegas’s Casino Slots, just FREE!
• Multiple machines and graphical themes
• Enjoyable bonus mini-games
• Win free spins
• Leader board - both friends and global
• Invite friends and get more FREE COINS
• Win achievements as you play
• Earn Gems for every spin and advance in levels
• Great winning odds

And, if you connect SlotoWatch to your Google games account, you will enjoy the full experience of leader boards and achievements! (connecting is optional)


SlotoWatch is constantly evolving and new features are added. We would love your feedback, please send any requests, ideas or questions to: info@slotowatch.com


NOTE: YOU MUST HAVE AN ANDROID WEAR DEVICE CONNECTED TO YOUR PHONE IN ORDER TO PLAY SLOTOWATCH.
comments: I don't know what happened, yet after my second spin the app completely locked up. No amount of uninstalling or restarting fix the problem. I've uninstalled.
What happened!? I'm back to level 1, and all gems gone? Made the mistake of uninstalling and reinstalling. Lost over 600,000 in coins. Not happy at all considering I have invested into this game.
Game play is simple,  good graphics,!  Unfortunately I'm now on level one with no crystals  and 55 million in the bank...  And I can only play the first machine now!
My favorite wear game Edit: Looks like the level bug is back. I'm back at level 1 again even though I have 9 mill in chips.....
Had to reset watch, I lost all my paid credits!, I had over 256000 credits, can you restore?
Great slots experience for the watch!
recentChanges: Face the Music - available from level 20
* Enhanced user interface to boost your experience
